items.title: iOS 26：查看与任何 iPhone 联系人的完整通话记录 (原标题: iOS 26: See Your Full Call History With Any iPhone Contact)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
## iOS 26：查看与任何 iPhone 联系人的完整通话记录

iOS 26 引入了一项隐藏功能，允许用户查看与特定联系人之间所有的通话历史记录，这些记录可能追溯到数年前。这项详细的通话历史记录功能可以在 iPhone 上快速访问，对于回顾上次通话时间或验证通话时长非常实用。

### 如何访问扩展通话记录

要查看与特定联系人的完整通话历史，请按照以下步骤操作：

1.  **打开“电话”应用**：在您的 iPhone 上启动“电话”应用。
2.  **查找联系人**：在“最近通话”部分（Unified 视图）中找到您想要查看其通话记录的联系人。
3.  **点击联系人名称**：
    *   如果您使用的是 Unified 视图，直接点击联系人的名称。
    *   如果您使用的是 Classic 界面，点击联系人姓名旁边的圆形“i”图标。
4.  **选择“通话记录”**：向下滚动并点击“通话记录”。

![iOS 26 通话记录](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EckUEmAD25Qz17TQ2megCTvjoCw=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-call-history.jpg?lossy)

### 详细信息

进入“通话记录”界面后，您将看到与该联系人之间所有来电、去电和未接电话的完整时间顺序记录。每条记录都包含通话的日期、时间以及持续时长。此视图可以追溯数月甚至数年，具体取决于您与该联系人保持联系的时间以及手机上存储的通话历史数据量。

![电话应用中的通话记录](https://images.macrumors.com/t/2qNUMj4ByBrcxY0sH2mbclMBddU=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/call-history-phone-app-ios.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: iOS 26 引入了一项隐藏功能，允许用户查看与任何 iPhone 联系人的完整通话历史记录。通过“电话”应用，用户可以在“最近通话”中选择联系人，然后点击“通话记录”，即可查看所有来电、去电和未接电话的详细时间、日期和时长，这些记录可能追溯数年。这项功能对于回顾通话和验证通话时长非常有用。
items.translated_title: iOS 26：查看与任何 iPhone 联系人的完整通话记录
items.content:
Buried within iOS 26 is a hidden history that lets you see every call you've ever exchanged with a specific contact, potentially going back years. You might not know it, but you can access this detailed call history on your iPhone in seconds.


Viewing the new extended history screen can come in handy when you need to recall when you last spoke with someone. It's also pretty useful when you want to verify a call duration for whatever reason. Here's how to get there.

Access Extended Call History


  1. Open the Phone app on your iPhone.

  2. In the Unified view, find the contact in the "Recents" section whose call history you want to view.

  3. Tap the contact's name (if you're using the Classic interface, tap the circled "i" icon next to their name.

  4. Scroll down and tap Call History.


  • iOS 26: How to Switch Back to the Classic Phone App Layout

You'll now see a complete chronological record of every incoming, outgoing, and missed call with that contact, including the date, time, and duration of each conversation. This view can stretch back in time for months or years, depending on how long you've been in touch and how much call history data is stored on your phone.
This article, "iOS 26: See Your Full Call History With Any iPhone Contact" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: iOS 26.1 中 iPhone 将获得的 5+ 项新功能 (原标题: 5+ New Features Your iPhone Will Get in iOS 26.1)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## iOS 26.1 新功能概览

苹果目前正在对 iOS 26.1 进行 Beta 测试，这是 iOS 26 操作系统的首次重大更新。尽管它不会带来期待已久的新版 Siri，但包含了多项实用的新功能和界面改进。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

### 主要新功能

*   **闹钟和计时器**
    *   锁定屏幕上的闹钟和计时器现在采用“滑动停止”按钮，而非“轻点停止”。
    *   用户可以轻点以小睡，但必须滑动才能完全关闭闹钟，从而有效防止误触。
    ![ios 26 1 slide to stop](https://images.macrumors.com/t/JjK3uoWLl9BJuErwKxwehRzIjzw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-slide-to-stop.jpg?lossy)

*   **Apple Intelligence 新增语言**
    *   Apple Intelligence 现已支持丹麦语、荷兰语、挪威语、葡萄牙语（葡萄牙）、瑞典语、土耳其语、繁体中文和越南语。

*   **AirPods 实时翻译新增语言**
    *   AirPods 实时翻译在 iOS 26.1 中增加了对日语、韩语、意大利语和中文（包括普通话繁体和简体）的支持。

*   **Apple Music**
    *   用户可以在 Apple Music 播放器上滑动歌曲标题区域来切换歌曲（下一首或上一首）。
    ![ios 26 1 apple music swipe](https://images.macrumors.com/t/iWj6xpADhwmHwh1o1i3bcGEyAuU=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-apple-music-swipe.jpg?lossy)

*   **健身应用**
    *   iPhone 上的健身应用现在允许用户创建自定义锻炼。可选择锻炼类型、预估活动卡路里、强度、持续时间和开始时间。
    *   相比之前更结构化的选项，新功能提供了更开放的自定义创建体验。
    ![ios 26 1 custom workout](https://images.macrumors.com/t/s3Tk9P-7n0vPEyA6y7czqYPBpBo=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-custom-workout.jpg?lossy)

*   **设置应用与主屏幕文件夹**
    *   设置应用中，带有文本标题的所有设置（如通用、蓝牙、Wi-Fi 等）现在都左对齐，而非居中对齐，带来了显著的视觉变化。
    ![ios 26 1 left aligned settings](https://images.macrumors.com/t/iv55lXc9QvRxHGw7hCvNOXHdXF8=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-left-aligned-settings.jpg?lossy)
    *   主屏幕文件夹的名称也从居中对齐改为左对齐，与设置应用的改变保持一致。
    ![ios 26 1 folder alignment](https://images.macrumors.com/t/axOjqOqH0LgafqNOadi6a5X8dww=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-folder-alignment.jpg?lossy)

*   **电话应用**
    *   电话键盘的数字现在采用了“液态玻璃”效果。
    ![ios 26 1 phone app keypad](https://images.macrumors.com/t/zopNTL2fSpKZ42-mA_uLWCRQasA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-phone-app-keypad.jpg?lossy)

*   **照片应用**
    *   照片应用中视频的滑动条已更新。
    ![ios 26 1 photos app video](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6217JpyD8uGay5Yk8G91FI0Nsn4=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-photos-app-video.jpg?lossy)
    *   导航栏具有更强的磨砂效果，在浅色背景下更容易查看。
    ![ios 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/usz4vpVeQA1UFBS85Xc6GKG5uOQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26.1-photos-buttons.jpg?lossy)
    *   管理多张已选照片的界面也进行了微调，“播放幻灯片”、“收藏”和“隐藏”功能现在位于菜单顶部。
    ![ios 26 1 photos app](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vu0px3ce6jRWQ_C9VbJW3vOw9Zc=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-photos-app.jpg?lossy)

*   **Safari 浏览器**
    *   Safari 底部标签栏更宽，边缘填充更少。在“降低透明度”模式下，填充增加，使其不再显得突兀。
    ![ios 26 1 safari bar](https://images.macrumors.com/t/CvyRnunBa06d5z3hODkIFLpuxCk=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/ios-26-1-safari-bar.jpg?lossy)

*   **后台安全改进**
    *   “设置”应用的“隐私与安全性”部分新增了一个开关，用于自动下载和安装安全改进，这是对先前“快速安全响应”功能的改进。
    ![ios 26 1 security improvements](https://images.macrumors.com/t/N2DUTGSg62pDDXWyp-A9WSjT7WE=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-security-improvements.jpg?lossy)

*   **显示设置**
    *   “设置”应用的“显示”部分现在使用 iOS 26 主题壁纸，而非 iOS 18 壁纸。
    ![display brightness setting ios 26 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/gfg6hLycplDIYMyJ_yiRecFQ2Bw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/display-brightness-setting-ios-26-1.jpg?lossy)

*   **液态玻璃效果**
    *   应用程序周围的光线折射效果在深色图标和背景颜色下变得更加微妙。

*   **壁纸**
    *   在锁定屏幕上设置壁纸时，如“双指缩放以裁剪”等说明会短暂显示后消失，而非一直显示。
    ![ios 26 1 wallpaper crop](https://images.macrumors.com/t/tfCUacTQHa_O1SIlJJsFOpNse8c=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ios-26-1-wallpaper-crop.jpg?lossy)

*   **显示辅助功能**
    *   “辅助功能”设置的“显示与文字大小”部分新增了“显示边框”开关，它会为所有按钮添加边框，取代了之前的“按钮形状”设置。

### iPadOS 26.1 特有更新

*   **随航 (Slide Over)**
    *   iPadOS 26.1 重新引入了“随航”功能。它与基于窗口的 iPadOS 26 多任务功能并行工作，用户可以在打开多个窗口的同时，滑动以快速访问一个“随航”应用。
    *   iPadOS 26.1 中一次只能有一个“随航”应用，可通过轻点绿色窗口调整按钮并切换“进入随航”来使用。
    ![ipados 26 1 slide over](https://images.macrumors.com/t/81VOK8kMc_rZGvoseq4jpcJv7Aw=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/ipados-26-1-slide-over.jpg?lossy)

*   **iPad 外接麦克风**
    *   现在 iPad 在使用外接麦克风时，可以调整输入增益。

### 可用性与发布

*   iOS 26.1 已面向开发者和公共 Beta 测试者开放。用户可访问苹果 Beta 网站注册公共 Beta 测试以体验新功能。
*   该版本兼容所有支持 iOS 26 的 iPhone 机型。
*   预计苹果将在 10 月底或 11 月初发布 iOS 26.1。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26.1作为iOS 26的首个重大更新，带来了多项实用功能和界面改进。核心更新包括：闹钟需“滑动停止”以防误触；Apple Intelligence和AirPods实时翻译新增多国语言；Apple Music支持滑动切歌；健身应用可创建自定义锻炼；设置和主屏幕文件夹标题左对齐；电话键盘采用“液态玻璃”效果；照片应用视频滑块和多选界面优化；Safari底部标签栏加宽；新增自动安全改进开关。iPadOS 26.1则重新引入了“随航”功能，并支持调节外接麦克风增益。该版本已开放测试，预计10月底或11月初发布。
items.translated_title: iOS 26.1 中 iPhone 将获得的 5+ 项新功能
items.content:
Apple is currently beta testing iOS 26.1, which will be the first major update to the iOS 26 operating system. It's not going to bring the new version of Siri that we've been waiting for, but it does include useful new features and interface changes.


We've rounded up all of the features that have been in iOS 26.1 so far.

Alarms and Timers


Alarms and timers that you set up in the Clock app now have a slide to stop button rather than a tap to stop button on the Lock Screen. You can snooze an alarm with a tap, but to turn it off entirely, you need to use a slide gesture.


The change makes it much harder to dismiss an alarm when you're trying to tap on the snooze button.

New Apple Intelligence Languages


Apple Intelligence is now available in Danish, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese (Portugal), Swedish, Turkish, Chinese (Traditional), and Vietnamese.

AirPods Live Translation Languages


AirPods Live Translation works with additional languages in iOS 26.1, including Japanese, Korean, Italian, and Chinese (both Mandarin Traditional and Simplified).

Apple Music


You can swipe on the music player in Apple Music to switch songs. Just slide a finger over where the song title is listed, and it'll go to the next song or back to the previous song.



Fitness App


You can create custom workouts in the Fitness app on iPhone. There are options for selecting workout type, estimated Active Calories, effort, duration, and start time.



There were workout creation options before, but they were more structured than the open, custom creation options that are in iOS 26.1.

Settings App


Apple changed the alignment of icons and text in the Settings app. All settings with headers that feature text now have that text aligned to the left instead of center aligned. It's a small change that makes a big visual difference.


This includes General, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Cellular, Personal Hotspot, Accessibility, and more.

Home Screen Folders


When you tap into a folder on the Home Screen, the name of the folder at the top is left aligned instead of center aligned, matching the changes made in the Settings app.


Phone


The Phone keypad now uses Liquid Glass for the numbers.


Photos


The slider for scrubbing through videos in the Photos app has been updated.


The navigation bar also has a slightly more frosted look that makes it easier to see on light backgrounds.


The interface for managing multiple photos that you've selected has been tweaked slightly. Play as Slideshow, Favorite, and Hide are now at the top of the menu.



Safari


The Tab Bar (Bottom) in Safari is wider with less padding around the edges. In Reduce Transparency mode, there's more padding, so it no longer looks odd.



Background Security Improvements


The Privacy and Security section of the Settings app now has a toggle to automatically download and install security improvements. It's a revamp of the prior Rapid Security Responses feature.


Display Settings


The Display section of the Settings app now has iOS 26-themed wallpaper instead of iOS 18 wallpaper.



Liquid Glass


The light refraction effect around apps is now more subtle with darker icon colors and background colors.

Wallpaper


When setting a wallpaper on the Lock Screen, instructions like Pinch to Crop show up momentarily and then disappear, rather than being shown all the time.



Display Accessibility


Under the Display and Text Size section in the Accessibility settings, there is a new "Display Borders" toggle. It adds a border to all buttons, and replaces the prior "Button Shapes" setting.

Bonus: iPadOS 26.1


Many of the changes above are in iPadOS 26.1 too, and iPadOS 26.1 also makes some changes to multitasking.

Slide Over


With iPadOS 26.1, Apple is reintroducing Slide Over. Slide Over works alongside the window-based iPadOS 26 multitasking functionality, so you can have multiple windows open and still swipe over to quickly access a Slide Over app.


You can only have one Slide Over app at a time in iPadOS 26.1, and you can use the feature by tapping on the green window resizing button and toggling on Enter Slide Over.

External Microphones on iPad


There's now an option to adjust input gain on the iPad when using an external microphone.

Download iOS 26.1


iOS 26.1 is available for both developers and public beta testers, so if you want to get your hands on the new features now, you can. It's easiest to sign up for public beta testing by visiting Apple's beta website.

Compatibility


iOS 26.1 is available on all iPhones that support ‌iOS 26‌.

Release Date


It's likely that Apple will release iOS 26.1 toward the end of October or the beginning of November.

More Features


Know of something new in iOS 26.1 that we missed? Let us know in the comments below.

items.title: tvOS 26 必试功能 (原标题: Must-Try tvOS 26 Features)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## tvOS 26 必试功能

苹果公司发布了 tvOS 26 更新，尽管 tvOS 更新通常不如 iOS 更新功能丰富，但仍带来了一些值得用户关注的实用新功能。以下是 tvOS 26 的主要亮点：

*   **液态玻璃 (Liquid Glass)**
    *   tvOS 26 中引入了微妙的液态玻璃效果，主要体现在按钮、界面元素和控制中心。
    *   它与 tvOS 操作系统融合良好，但其应用范围不如 iOS 26 中的液态玻璃效果广泛。

*   **Apple TV 应用**
    *   Apple TV 应用经过了全面改造，现在可以在屏幕上同时显示更多的电视节目和电影。

*   **用户资料 (Profiles)**
    *   在 tvOS 26 中切换用户资料变得更加容易。
    *   用户可以在 Apple TV 从睡眠中唤醒时选择资料，从而将个人喜欢的内容与其他家庭成员的内容分开。
    *   这有助于提供更个性化的内容推荐，并有效区分儿童和成人内容。

*   **卡拉 OK (Apple Music Sing)**
    *   使用 Apple Music Sing 功能时，用户可以将 iPhone 作为麦克风。
    *   iPhone 可以实时显示歌词、歌词翻译和歌词发音。

*   **隔空播放 (AirPlay)**
    *   如果用户将第三方扬声器与 Apple TV 配合使用，现在可以将其设置为默认的 AirPlay 扬声器。
    *   Apple TV 将自动使用这些扬声器，用户无需每次使用设备时都进行选择。

*   **FaceTime**
    *   Apple TV 自去年起已支持通过 iPhone 作为摄像头进行 FaceTime 通话。
    *   tvOS 26 带来了更新的卡片式界面，并新增了对带字幕的实时翻译功能的支持。

*   **屏幕保护程序 (Screen Savers)**
    *   用户可以选择自己喜欢的屏幕保护程序类别，例如城市风光、地球、风景等。
    *   如果需要，每个用户都可以选择自己的专属屏幕保护程序。
items.shortSummary: tvOS 26 引入了多项实用新功能。主要亮点包括：微妙的液态玻璃界面效果、重新设计的 Apple TV 应用可显示更多内容、更便捷的用户资料切换以实现个性化推荐和内容分离。此外，Apple Music Sing 支持将 iPhone 作为卡拉 OK 麦克风，提供实时歌词和翻译。用户现在可以将第三方扬声器设置为默认 AirPlay 输出，FaceTime 界面得到更新并支持实时翻译，同时还增加了自定义屏幕保护程序的功能。
items.content:
Alongside iOS 26, Apple introduced a new tvOS 26 update for the Apple TV. tvOS updates aren't as feature rich as iOS updates and often go under the radar, so we thought we'd highlight some of the useful new features that you should check out.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.


  • Liquid Glass - Liquid Glass has a subtle presence in tvOS 26, with Apple adding Liquid Glass buttons, interface elements, and Control Center. It's not as extensive as Liquid Glass in ‌iOS 26‌, and it blends in well with the tvOS operating system.

  • Apple TV app - The ‌Apple TV‌ app has been overhauled and it displays more TV shows and movies on the screen at one time.

  • Profiles - It's much easier to switch profiles in tvOS 26, so you can keep the content that you like separate from the content that other people in the family prefer. You can choose a profile whenever you wake your ‌Apple TV‌ up from sleep. You'll get better suggestions on a per-person basis, and it's a great way to separate kid content from adult content.

  • Karaoke - When using Apple Music Sing, you can use your iPhone as a microphone. The ‌iPhone‌ can show you real-time lyrics, lyric translations, and lyrics pronunciation.

  • AirPlay - If you use third-party speakers with the ‌Apple TV‌, you can now set them as the default AirPlay speakers. Your ‌Apple TV‌ will then automatically use those speakers and you won't have to select your speaker each time you use the device.

  • FaceTime - FaceTime has been supported on the ‌Apple TV‌ since last year with an ‌iPhone‌ as the camera, but now there's an updated, card-style interface and support for Live Translation with captions.

  • Screen Savers - You can pick your favorite screen saver categories, choosing cityscape, earth, landscapes, and more. Each person can choose their own screen savers if desired.


Have a favorite tvOS 26 feature? Let us know in the comments below, and check out our video for even more tvOS tips and tricks.

items.title: 苹果发布适用于AirPods Pro 3、AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4的新固件 (原标题: Apple Releases New Firmware for AirPods Pro 3, AirPods Pro 2 and AirPods 4)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果发布AirPods Pro 3、AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4新固件

苹果公司于2025年10月7日发布了针对AirPods Pro 3、前代AirPods Pro 2以及AirPods 4型号的新固件。

### 固件版本信息

*   **新版本号**：8A358
*   **旧版本号**：8A356

### 更新内容

目前尚无关于8A358固件具体更新内容的官方说明。然而，据推测，此次更新可能旨在修复错误或改进iOS 26中为AirPods带来的现有功能。

### 8A356固件带来的主要功能（前次更新）

前一个版本8A356的固件为AirPods Pro 2、AirPods Pro 3和带主动降噪（ANC）的AirPods 4增加了多项iOS 26功能，包括：

*   **音频质量提升**：显著改善了电话和视频通话的音频质量。
*   **录音室品质录音**：为采访、播客和视频提供了录音室品质的音频录制功能。
*   **实时翻译**：引入了实时翻译功能。

### 固件安装步骤

用户可以通过以下步骤更新其AirPods固件：

1.  确保您的AirPods在iPhone、iPad或Mac的蓝牙连接范围内。
2.  将AirPods放入充电盒中。
3.  将充电盒连接到电源。
4.  保持充电盒盖子关闭。
5.  等待至少30分钟，固件更新将自动完成。

![AirPods Pro Firmware Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/9NvRO4p0bPE-rOw0z70Pc-9RhhY=/400x0/article-new/2021/11/AirPods-Pro-Firmware-Feature.jpg?lossy)

items.translated_title: 苹果发布适用于AirPods Pro 3、AirPods Pro 2和AirPods 4的新固件
items.content:
Apple today released new firmware designed for the AirPods Pro 3, prior-generation AirPods Pro 2, and the AirPods 4 models. The firmware has a build number of 8A358, up from 8A356.


There's no word on what's include in the updated firmware, but the prior 8A356 update added iOS 26 features to the AirPods Pro 2, ‌AirPods Pro 3‌, and ‌AirPods 4‌ with ANC. The software introduced better audio quality for phone calls and video calls, studio-quality audio recording for interviews, podcasts, videos, Live Translation, and more.

It's possible that the 8A358 firmware addresses a bug or brings improvements to some of the new ‌iOS 26‌ AirPods features.

To install the new firmware, make sure your AirPods are in range of your iPhone, iPad, or Mac. From there, put your AirPods in the Charging Case and connect the Charging Case to power. Keep the case closed and wait at least 30 minutes for the firmware update to install.

items.title: 苹果通过10月10日的Apple Watch活动挑战庆祝“正念月” (原标题: Apple Celebrating 'Mindful Month' With October 10 Apple Watch Activity Challenge)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果Apple Watch“正念月”活动挑战

苹果计划于2025年10月10日（星期五）举办一场名为“正念月”的Apple Watch活动挑战。此项挑战旨在提高人们对心理健康、自我关怀、冥想和正念的认识。

### 参与方式与奖励

*   **参与要求**：用户需记录10分钟的正念或冥想活动。任何能够将正念分钟数添加到“健康”应用的App均可用于完成此挑战。
*   **奖励**：成功完成挑战的用户将获得一系列可在信息（Messages）应用中使用的动画贴纸。

### 活动背景

“正念月”是Apple Watch活动挑战系列中相对较新的一个，苹果于去年首次推出。此前，苹果最近一次的活动挑战是在8月份，旨在突出国家公园日。

items.translated_title: 苹果通过10月10日的Apple Watch活动挑战庆祝“正念月”
items.content:
Apple plans to hold a "Mindful Month" Apple Watch Activity Challenge on Friday, October 10. Mindful Month brings awareness to mental health, self care, meditation, and mindfulness.

On October 10th, let's take some time to appreciate all the ways we can care for ourselves and each other. Record 10 minutes of mindfulness or meditation with any app that adds mindful minutes to Health to get this award.
Like all of the Apple Watch Activity Challenges, the Mindful Month event will come with animated stickers that can be used in the Messages app.








Mindful Month is a relatively new addition to the Apple Watch Activity Challenge lineup, with Apple first introducing it last year. Apple's last Activity Challenge was held in August and highlighted National Park Day.
